text: Val Yacula (1908 - September 24, 1958) was a Canadian politician. He represented the electoral district of Springfield in the House of Commons of Canada as a member of the Progressive Conservatives. He was elected in the 1958 election. However, he died on September 24, 1958, after just 178 days in office. ==External links== * Category:1908 births Category:1958 deaths Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Manitoba Category:Progressive Conservative Party of Canada MPs Category:Ukrainian emigrants to Canada
title: Val Yacula
